data.output:
PERSON: Angela Merkel
Job Title: Former Chancellor of Germany
Description: Angela Merkel is a German retired politician who served as Chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021. She is the only woman to have held the office.
Sources:
- https://www.britannica.com/biography/Angela-Merkel: 'Angela Merkel (born July 17, 1954, Hamburg, West Germany) is a German politician who served as chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021.'
- https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/dec/08/angela-merkel-bids-farewell-as-german-chancellor-after-16-years: 'Angela Merkel was Germany's first female chancellor, in office from 2005 to 2021, and leader of the center-right Christian Democratic Union from 2000 to 2018.'

ORGANIZATION: Christian Democratic Union (CDU)
Website: https://www.cdu.de/
Description: The Christian Democratic Union (CDU) is a center-right political party in Germany. Angela Merkel served as the leader of the CDU from 2000 to 2018.
Sources:
- https://www.cdu.de/: 'The CDU is a center-right political party in Germany.'
- https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/dec/08/angela-merkel-bids-farewell-as-german-chancellor-after-16-years: 'Angela Merkel was Germany's first female chancellor, in office from 2005 to 2021, and leader of the center-right Christian Democratic Union from 2000 to 2018.'

EVENT: Angela Merkel's tenure as Chancellor of Germany
Date: 2005-2021
Description: Angela Merkel served as Chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021. During her tenure, she was the first female Chancellor of Germany and served for 16 years.
Sources:
- https://www.britannica.com/biography/Angela-Merkel: 'Angela Merkel (born July 17, 1954, Hamburg, West Germany) is a German politician who served as chancellor of Germany from 2005 to 2021.'
- https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/dec/08/angela-merkel-bids-farewell-as-german-chancellor-after-16-years: 'Angela Merkel was Germany's first female chancellor, in office from 2005 to 2021, and leader of the center-right Christian Democratic Union from 2000 to 2018.'

EVENT: Angela Merkel's leadership of the CDU
Date: 2000-2018
Description: Angela Merkel served as the leader of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU) from 2000 to 2018. During her leadership, she was the first female leader of the CDU.
Sources:
- https://www.cdu.de/: 'The CDU is a center-right political party in Germany.'
- https://www.theguardian.com/world/2021/dec/08/angela-merkel-bids-farewell-as-german-chancellor-after-16-years: 'Angela Merkel was Germany's first female chancellor, in office from 2005 to 2021, and leader of the center-right Christian Democratic Union from 2000 to 2018.'
